snippet: Waikato Chiefs flyhalf Gareth Anscombe failed with a last minute 52 metre penalty as the Canterbury Crusaders hung on for a 18-17 win over the defending Super Rugby champions in Hamilton on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Slade Boots Crusaders to Win at Chiefs
headline.main: Slade Boots Crusaders to Win at Chiefs

lead_paragraph: Waikato Chiefs flyhalf Gareth Anscombe failed with a last minute 52 metre penalty as the Canterbury Crusaders hung on for a 18-17 win over the defending Super Rugby champions in Hamilton on Saturday.
